about.contentTruck: The company specializes in freight transportation in Europe, Belarus and Russia. Our fleet consists from refrigerated trucks with a lifting capacity up to three tons.All vehicles comply with environmental standards EURO 5 and EURO 6, equipped with communications equipment and satellite navigation.
about.contentCargo: The company has a warehouse near Warsaw, Poland.
